bug.author: mouradmourafiq
bug.summary: Regression when sorting by datetime fields in the UI
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
It seems like the sorting by datetime fields is reversed: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1261626/84402276-88038480-ac04-11ea-9819-8af052390378.png></denchmark-link>
New-Old: is doing asc Old-New: is doing desc <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
The issue is in the UI, cli/client seems fine. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
1.0.96
